title: Bullet For My Valentine set for Southampton gig
text:
0 comments 
BULLET For My Valentine appear in Southampton next week in support of their fifth studio album Venom. 
Produced by Carl Bown and Colin Richardson (Slipknot, Machine Head, Trivium) at Metropolis Studio in London, Venom is an unrelenting, fierce step forward for Bullet For My Valentine. 
Their heaviest record to date, it sinks its teeth into listeners with a powerful delivery by vocalist/guitarist Matt Tuck, ferocious riffs by guitarist Michael “Padge” Paget and rapid-fire rhythm courtesy of drummer Michael “Moose” Thomas. 
The band are joined on tour by fellow Welshman Jamie Mathias as their new bass player and backing vocalist. 
Bullet For My Valentine have established themselves as one of the biggest bands on the planet. Share article 
Over the course of their astonishing career they have sold 10 million albums and toured the globe countless times, gaining more fans at every turn. In the UK their last tour saw them hit sell out arenas, including the 10,000 capacity Wembley Arena. 
* See them live at 02 Guildhall Southampton on Wednesday.
